H0.text: In which ‘business’ did John Davidson Rockefeller make his fortune. Steel

H1.text: In which ‘business’ did John Davidson Rockefeller make his fortune. Railroads

H2.text: In which ‘business’ did John Davidson Rockefeller make his fortune. Banking

H3.text: In which ‘business’ did John Davidson Rockefeller make his fortune. OIL

A4.text: Rockefeller concentrated his business on oil refining.

A5.text: Rockefeller founded the Standard Oil Company in 1870.
